import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update a funding source"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/funding-sources/{FundingSourceId}/update"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates a funding source by applying the fields provided in the request body. Only send the fields you want to change; omitted fields remain unchanged.

**Prerequisites**
1. **FundingSourceId** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/funding-sources/query](/docs/api/funding-sources/search-funding-sources) to locate the record and extract `Items[].FundingSourceId`.
2. (Optional) Current values - Use [GET /api/v1.0/funding-sources/\{FundingSourceId\}](/docs/api/funding-sources/get-funding-source-by-id) to review existing values before editing.

**Workflow Example**
1. Identify record: [POST /api/v1.0/funding-sources/query](/docs/api/funding-sources/search-funding-sources) -&gt; choose the target `FundingSourceId`.
2. Update: [POST /api/v1.0/funding-sources/\{FundingSourceId\}/update](/docs/api/funding-sources/update-funding-source) with the fields to change.
3. Verify: [GET /api/v1.0/funding-sources/\{FundingSourceId\}](/docs/api/funding-sources/get-funding-source-by-id) to confirm updates.

**Minimal Required Fields**: `FundingSourceId` (path) plus at least one body field to update.

**Note**: This API is deprecated.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"FundingSourceId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the funding source to update","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Funding source fields to update","required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request payload for creating or updating a funding source.","properties":{"FundingSourceId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier (required for updates, optional for creates)."},"FundingSourceTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID of the funding source type."},"FundingSourceStatusTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID of the funding source status type."},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID of the site this funding source belongs to."},"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID of the product associated with this funding source."},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name of the funding source."},"Description":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Detailed description of the funding source."},"AmountAllocated":{"type":"number","format":"decimal","description":"Total budget amount allocated."},"AmountUsed":{"type":"number","format":"decimal","description":"Amount spent from this funding source."},"AmountRemaining":{"type":"number","format":"decimal","description":"Remaining balance available."},"StartDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","nullable":true,"description":"Start date of the budget period."},"EndDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","nullable":true,"description":"End date of the budget period."}},"title":"UpdateFundingSourceRequest"},"example":{"Name":"ESSER III Technology Fund - Updated","AmountAllocated":550000,"Description":"Federal COVID relief funds for educational technology (increased allocation)"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
